prompt.text: Name of the distribution officer

Hi, my name is {{data.officer}} from the Red Cross. I am going to verify all necessary documents for the distribution.

Are you the beneficiary, or a proxy representing the beneficiary?

Please show me :

- the proxy letter fully filled in and signed by the beneficiary
- Beneficiary original official ID
- RCRC beneficiary card 
- Proxy original official ID

hint.text: Are all 4 documents valid and does the beneficiary card have the VERIFICATION stamp and signature?

prompt.text:
Please show me :

- the beneficiary RCRC card 
- beneficiary original ID document

hint.text: Are the 2 documents valid and does the beneficiary card have the VERIFICATION stamp and signature?

prompt.text:
Prior to the distribution, you need to go to the verification desk and get their approval.

Please go to the Verification desk.
Do they match with the beneficiary data from the ben card?

hint.text: Please ensure that the planned distribution date is in line with today's date

prompt.text:
Beneficiary data is correct.

We are now going to key in the proxy data and then we will proceed to the distribution.

hint.text: Please keep the proxy letter at the distribution desk for archive.

prompt.text: Type of ID of the proxy
Proxy's ID Number
Proxy's LASTNAME(s)

constraint_message.text: Please type LASTNAME in uppercase only.

prompt.text: Proxy's firstname(s)
Proxy's gender
Proxy's relationship with the beneficiary?

Assigned envelop/voucher/PIN #:

data('assigned_item_pack_code ')

Please have the proxy: {{data.proxy_lastname}} / {{data.proxy_firstname}} signing off the reception of the above checked items, on behalf of the beneficiary {{data.ben_lastname}} / {{data.ben_firstname}}.

hint.text: Please keep the proxy letter at the distribution desk for archive.

prompt.text: Please have {{data.ben_lastname}} / {{data.ben_firstname}} sign off the reception of the above checked items.
Please stamp and sign the beneficiary card to confirm that the above checked items have been distributed to {{data.ben_lastname}} / {{data.ben_firstname}}.
Collect the GPS coordinates of the distribution site
Please {{officer}} sign off the distribution:
Thank you, the process has been completed!

initial.comments: skips the finalize screen where the user chooses to save as incomplete or finalized and instead saves as finalized
